title: THE BODY IN THE GRAVEYARD
description: Next, Inspector Irratino wanted to go to a graveyard. So he used astrology to determine which graveyard they should visit, a method Deductive Logico detested. When they got to the graveyard, the caretaker had just been killed. Inspector Irratino elbowed Deductive Logico. "See!"

suspects.name: SIR RULEAN
suspects.description: A sophisticated gentleman who was just recently knighted, if you believe the shoddy paperwork he carries with him.

suspects.name: VISCOUNT EMINENCE
suspects.description: The oldest man you have ever seen. It is said that he was old when the old were young.

suspects.name: BROTHER BROWNSTONE
suspects.description: A monk who has dedicated his life to the church, specifically to making money for it.

weapons.name: A SKELETON ARM
weapons.description: Cause the death of a person with the bones of a person who's dead.

weapons.name: A VIAL OF A DEADLY POISON
weapons.description: Don't worry. It's safely contained byâ€”hey, wait, where's the cork?!

weapons.name: A STRING OF PRAYER BEADS
weapons.description: Ivory prayer beads covered with tiny engraved symbols.

locations.name: THE COLUMBARIUM
locations.description: A vault or wall where ashes are stored. (Now you've learned a new word.)

locations.name: THE HUGE MAUSOLEUM
locations.description: The rich members of the Midnight family are all buried in this pyramid-shaped tomb.

locations.name: THE GIFT SHOP
locations.description: You can buy little knickknack gravestones or a plushie of their mascot, Mr. Skull.

clues: Detective Logico's forensics team discovered a drop of poison in a giant pyramid.
Inspector Irratino found a finger bone in the columbarium. A telltale sign!

statements.speaker: Sir Rulean
statements.statement: I brought a string of prayer beads.

statements.speaker: Viscount Eminence
statements.statement: Yes, well, I brought a skeleton arm.

statements.speaker: Brother Brownstone
statements.statement: On the honor of my order, I was not in the gift shop.
